Reviews.Content: Holy crap this is way to inexpensive for how great it is!! I can't believe the quality of pictures it takes!

Reviews.Title: finepix
Reviews.Author: Nameer
Reviews.Content: I like this camera for its weight, which is not that heavy and the good quality pictures. I am took it with me for many events around the country and it is great!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera.
Reviews.Author: Ronald Nance
Reviews.Content: One reason I rated it high...it has two view finders one is the digital screen and the other is the direct viewer.  For me the direct viewer is what I am use too.

Reviews.Title: simple, yet breath taking.
Reviews.Author: Wesley J. Zebrowski
Reviews.Content: Read the directions and you will have superb pictures to download or frame.macro is great as well . Still trying to get the feel of the panarama part. All in all an easy 5. BYW buy 8 double a batteries with a charger and you will never run out of power. A#1

Reviews.Title: instant service
Reviews.Author: Daryl Martens
Reviews.Content: Good stuff, very quick, thanks for the great service, I use it daily with no problems.the complete package is what I was after, thanks again

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: kevin browner
Reviews.Content: i love this camera. zoom knob sometimes sticks. the front part of my lense area fell off but i have a warranty so until i see how they treat me i cant really give it five stars lol.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Josh West
Reviews.Content: takes awesome pictures, good quality, dark or light. I love the camera. it takes great action pictures also. Will not use another camera again

Reviews.Title: Fujfilmi FinePix S4200 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Deborah La Rue
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing camera. I love it and am so happy with its ability to take the pictures that I need for my jewelry business. I would recommend this camera to anyone and the instructions are easy to understand and it comes with a DVD which was very helpful.

Reviews.Title: LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: LynneD
Reviews.Content: Boy what a great camera, I bought this camera to start a new hobbie and couldn't be happier with my purchase. I would recommend this to anyone who is a rookie level photographer  wanna be!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camersa for the price
Reviews.Author: Roger Fenton
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camers for my wife as a replacement for her professional camera which is in need of repair, but have not got around to getting it done.  She also wanted one that was not so heavy and had to wrry about anyone stealing it or it getting damaged.  The camera came and she has been taking pictures non-stop.  Really good pictures for the value of tha camera.  In my opinion, you can't go wrong in this purchase, we haven't

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm
Reviews.Author: CC215
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my dad! who is not technology savoy, but it is very easy for him to use and the picture quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: dejan husic
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera gor the money. We just came back from Peru and these 950 pictures i took with it are awrsome looking. Love the zoom...

Reviews.Title: JMR
Reviews.Author: JAN
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, takes great pictures! Have not used it as much as I want but will soon. So far it has been great! Would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: I think it should have had a memory card included so when I take pictures I can keep them.
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: A memory card would have been the right way to provide the camera to be useful. The camera is good quality so far.Dave

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Carol DiCenso
Reviews.Content: This camera replaced my old Fujifilm fine pix which lasted many many years.  Better than old one!  Still learning all functions but so far I love it.

Reviews.Title: I use it all the time!
Reviews.Author: V. Sikes
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It has a couple of very minor quirks - nothing major and they don't bother me at all.

Reviews.Title: I'm happy
Reviews.Author: L.M.
Reviews.Content: Great camera!! It's Simple to use. Takes great photos. I'm very happy I got it for my new photography hobby!!!

Reviews.Title: fujifilm camera
Reviews.Author: angela finkbiner
Reviews.Content: the only thing I don't like is that the on off switch sticks and it don't want to shut off at time.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera.
Reviews.Author: Sheresa Snyder
Reviews.Content: A very nice camera,  just what I was looking for.  Also a great camera for the price.  I'm still working on all the the different things that the camera has to offer, but this one will be a keeper. The number on thing that I was looking for was that the camera would have a seperate viewfinder feature and this camera had that.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Irma Jeanne Heltzel
Reviews.Content: Haven't gotten used to camera yet so I can't really give it 5 stars but it is headed in that direction.  Excellent pictures, zoom was awesome. Pictures came out great on Auto setting and have tried other settings but need to practice more.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera,
Reviews.Author: psalm84:11
Reviews.Content: The camera is fine.  It is just learning how to use it!  I have the manual, but being dyslexic-you know how that goes-well hopefully not.  I plan to start watching youtube videos on digital cameras-what is the apature? and how do you spell it?  If you meet a dyslexic give them a warm smile, they probly need it!

Reviews.Title: Great Bridge Cam
Reviews.Author: william
Reviews.Content: Was a bit weary going with a Fuji, but this camera has served me well since I got it. The S4200 bridge was a step up from my previous point & shoot, and has given me sufficient practice for my next camera- a full on DSLR. If you're looking for a reasonably priced "in- between" cam, I certainly would recommend the Fuji S4200. Delivery of the camera was prompt, so no complaints there either. Arrived as described by seller, and I've been having a blast with it so far! In fact, I thought about selling this after I got my first DSLR, but have grown somewhat attached to it. Think I'll hang on to this gem for awhile longer!

Reviews.Title: Great Starter Camera
Reviews.Author: Chalise Crowder
Reviews.Content: This has been a great starter camera for us. We are still learning all of its functions . It has been easy to use so far.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: DWH
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, good quality photos.  I suggest you download the user manual available on line as it has more complete instructions on the various modes of the camera than the enclosed user guide.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Fergie
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my 12 year old who is taking a photography class. She is finding it to be easy to use and the instructions are great. She is using it for a photography class.

Reviews.Title: Great Pix From Close Up To Zoom
Reviews.Author: Jim Fenn
Reviews.Content: This camera is the perfect compromise between too fancy or not enough.  I figured it out without the user's manual.  I can walk around and photograph anything from a small flower to a distant animal.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: ivan sisco
Reviews.Content: the only problem with getting this camera was that it did not come with a  card to store  pics,  disappointing because we had to go to a store and buy the card before we could use it.

Reviews.Title: It's very good
Reviews.Author: Mohammed
Reviews.Content: Thank you so much, it's excellent and good deal I appreciated you. It helps me too much and give a good result.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great Price
Reviews.Author: jguy6297
Reviews.Content: I received my camera as I was told I would, within two days with Prime. It ships in a small box with the fujifilm box within that. The camera itself is good for people who want a point and shoot camera that has a little class, and has some better features. Specifically, the zoom on this baby is incredible. With digital, it can go to 150x, which if focused up close (it cannot) is the equivalent of a microscope. Flash is good, but is manual, there is no auto flash feature. It comes with a strap that I struggled with putting on. I still don't know if I put it on correctly or backwards. Whatever you do, be uniform in your actions. All in all, it's a great camera with great functions that I look forward to using.

Reviews.Title: It was a good deal
Reviews.Author: natalie34
Reviews.Content: it works okay for the price I paid for it, next time I may spend a little more money and upgrade

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Sharon620
Reviews.Content: Thank you the camera is excellent, I wish I would have ordered it sooner so I could have taken it to my nephews graduation.

Reviews.Title: Good Starter Camera
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I am a photographer and i personally own this camera.  I enjoy using this camera but it is more of a starter camera.  I would highly recommend it to people that are just getting into the business or to recreational users.  It is a dependable and fairly cheap model.  Overall good product

Reviews.Title: Fuji-digital Camera
Reviews.Author: lovetobuyandsave
Reviews.Content: I love this camera-it takes really fine photo's-I have my degree in Botany and take many landscape  photo's got it a few weeks ago and have taken close up photo's of Butterflies and plants-as well people.  Easy to operate-great photo's and at a great price! Love it I buy quite a few items and I give this a 5 star!

Reviews.Title: S4200 Camera
Reviews.Author: Heather "Heather D. Burch"
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera. It is pretty easy to use and takes great photos. Some of my night photos aren't the best quality, but that is my only complaint.

Reviews.Title: fujifilm finepix s4200 camera
Reviews.Author: Rose Madurski
Reviews.Content: I got this as my other camera crapped out after a long use...I need one with some substance, as I do not feel comfortable with one of the smaller ones...this one works fine so far...haven't used it for a lot of different things, but am planning on doing just that

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: m.enos
Reviews.Content: This camera is wonderful takes absolutely beautiful pictures. My daughter loves it. Would purchase another in the near future amazing

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: James B Cox
Reviews.Content: Great pictures and easy to use. Of course there are many options that I have yet to explore but I took it on our recent vacation and was very pleased with the quality of the pictures. The low light capability was great.

Reviews.Title: I love my Camera
Reviews.Author: badbubbaou812
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice piece of equipmet! I have a lot of the cheaper camera's and I really took a step out on this one cause it is my first more exspencive Camera. I love the way it takes pics. I have had a lot of compliments on this cameras ability to take some of the finest pics. I had one girl wanting to trade me her cannon. I dont know a lot about camera's but I shure do like this one. Thanks to amazon for supporting such a great product!!

Reviews.Title: Fujiflim FinePix S4299 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: chihuahua
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera because it has a viewfinder. I do not like using the LCD screen outdoors because, with the sun behind me, the screen appears black and I cannot see what I'm photographing .The camera is so easy to use. I thoroughly enjoy using it and highly recommend it to anyone who needs an easy way to take photos. I paint and need to photograph small pictures close up.This camera does a perfect job of this close up work.The camera is a joy to use.

Reviews.Title: the zoom....it's not all good
Reviews.Author: CR
Reviews.Content: pics are good just keep still. the recording is awesome. the zoom gets dull and blurry. so yea it's not the best but its a camera and i'm no pro so i'm happy.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Richard Smith
Reviews.Content: I love the picture's that I took they were so nice and a lot better than the camera I had. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Fuji cameras
Reviews.Author: Einstein, WV
Reviews.Content: I've always had good luck with Fuji cameras. This is the first one I've purchased with zoom and all thee extra stuff you can do (if you can figure it out) I like to take candid photos, mostly of people and animals so it helps to have a camera that you can point and shoot. This one is not like that at all. Maybe I'm just too stupid to have a camera with all these extra features,like video and zoom. But besides that after one charging the camera stopped working. Made sure the battery was charged but nothing would work. I sent it back to Fuji priority mail and it took them a very long time to send an email saying it was received and it would be repaired or replaced, I think when they get around to it. I sent it back on 8-6 and have no idea when I'll get it back. To say I'm disappointed in Fuji is an understatement and I don't think I will buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Christopher J. Wells
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I am not a professional photographer but other comments helped me decide this was the one for me.  I love how light it is, while still providing the feel of a larger camera.  It seems to take a lot of pictures before needing the batteries changed.  I have gone 13 days on one charge.  I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Dibo
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures and is easy to use.  I am still learning how to use it but I am more than pleased.

Reviews.Title: great digital camera for the money
Reviews.Author: william j kennedy
Reviews.Content: i'm a amateur photographer and I really like this camera.  I never owned a digital camera with a zoom so I wanted one.  for the money I spent on it I really was surprised at how nice the pictures turned out.  I will never get rid of this camera for sure.

Reviews.Title: It takes pictures.
Reviews.Author: The Jackalope Mount
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with the majority of the functions on this camera.  I thought I was going to have some control over the focus, which is minutely true, at best.  I don't take many pictures, so I don't really care.

Reviews.Title: beauty
Reviews.Author: Vicius B.
Reviews.Content: it is a great product for the money. I love it, I took a few pictures with it for my baby dedication and my daughter birthday.  It was amazing.

Reviews.Title: looks good on paper
Reviews.Author: Explosive Diorama "spastic-cologne"
Reviews.Content: The pictures don't come out crisp and clear I can't explain why. I wish i had not bought this item

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: alexchadwick
Reviews.Content: great camera  very good price my son loves it its very easy to use. would highly recommend this great camera

Reviews.Title: I Really Like This Camera
Reviews.Author: Adele "Adele"
Reviews.Content: I bought eight of these for my students to use in a digital photography seminar.  They enjoyed them the first semester with no problems.  We will continue using them next semester.  They are a great value for what you're getting.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Kelzzz3
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, takes very good pictures and is very easy to use.I had problems with the first camera I ordered and they replaced it. Would definitely do business with them again.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: waldo
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a good camera but didn't want to spend a small fortune. Have started taking lots of pictures the last year or so with my tablet and phone, but wanted to get a digital camera. My Fujifilm FinePix is easy to use and has loads of features. i'm very pleased and highly recommend this product. :)

Reviews.Title: Very convenient and helpful for catching memorable scenes!
Reviews.Author: Lalie
Reviews.Content: This is my newest digital camera.  I am practicing with it and the features it has really add to my interest in photography.Fujifilm is my favorite.  This one has a lot to add to help catching the right photos.  I've already gone through a test and the photos show up great on the computer.

Reviews.Title: Ok i love this camera
Reviews.Author: chasestratus
Reviews.Content: quality is fantastic, i really dont know much about camera's but when i took a few pics and saw the difference in quality compared to my cell phone pics.  i was blown away.  i highly recommend this camera to anyone who loves to take pictures of the out doors and family.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for in a camera!
Reviews.Author: Pamela Sloan
Reviews.Content: I have had 3 cameras in the past 10 years and this is the first one that is everything I wanted! It has great zoom capabilities that produce clear pictures. It is easy to figure out how to operate, and will take picture after picture if it is in focus. I did not want to spend a fortune on a camera since I am not a professional, and for that this camera does it all!

Reviews.Title: Fuji camera
Reviews.Author: Robin Stafford
Reviews.Content: The camera is a good investment.  It's my first digital camera and it works great.  I was surprized by how well the zoom works.  You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!!!
Reviews.Author: Jess
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  This is my first fancier camera the others have always been simple cameras with no ability to change styles or settings. The zoom is remarkable photos look like u could reach out and touch them. The bar has been set really high for future cameras. :)

Reviews.Title: Very good item
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: We have only had this camera for a short time but it is performing very well so far. It was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Gotschall
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, easy to use, and takes fabulous pictures. Daughter uses it to take outside/inside pictures and every picture turns out great.

Reviews.Title: My best acquisition
Reviews.Author: Melkiss
Reviews.Content: I'm so proud to have purchased this camera. It's very light, the quality of the images is indescribable. Very modern and compact, 100% recommended

Reviews.Title: great pics...
Reviews.Author: micky
Reviews.Content: this is really a good camera for pictures and videos and also very easy to use. i would really recomend it to any one who like to take pics and capture the momment. i love it!

Reviews.Title: Lots to learn
Reviews.Author: Avis Hutchinson
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a great camera! The main drawback I have (so far) is the batteries. Even though the 4 batteries last a decent amount of time (depending on how often the camera is used, of course), I find buying batteries a nuisance; and closing the battery compartment is often difficult. A rechargeable battery, like the one in my pocket-sized point and shoot, would be so much better!! There are a lot of features that I'm still trying to figure out but ease of use isn't so bad. It does take good quality, clear pictures. But keeping it steady when on full zoom offers a challenge. I'm working on it!

Reviews.Title: Husband Loved it!
Reviews.Author: Lydia Gallant
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my husband for Fathers day. He's is amazed at all it can do.  He absolutely loves it!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Mickeylee
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, what great quality photos this thing takes, and the price was excellent. I love to take photos of my kids and this has allowed me the opportunity to capture a lot of moments.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: kc07marlene
Reviews.Content: This is a very great camera for a family to take pictures with an get the effect of a professional!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Peggy
Reviews.Content: By far the best camera I have ever owned.  Still learning all the many features but the quality of the pictures I have taken so far have been very, very good.  Great purchase for the money and free shipping with Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Toby Christian
Reviews.Content: For the price this is a great camera and a very good choice is you don't have the money for a DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Bedros Babekian
Reviews.Content: Its amazing! Im not a major camera person but i do know its basic components. Can zoom in very far. Has micro-focus, and manual flash. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera easy to use
Reviews.Author: Terry Mosley
Reviews.Content: The camera works very well and serves the purpose for which I bought it, taking interior and exterior shots of homes

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: R. Brewer
Reviews.Content: Came sooner than expected. This camera takes outstanding pictures. Very simple to use. I love the video feature and with the sd card I can get about 9 minutes of video, which I think is great for it not being a specific camcorder.

Reviews.Title: met my expectations
Reviews.Author: Cal Paranteau
Reviews.Content: The product arrived as scheduled in an undamaged container. I've never had a camera of this caliber & depended on reviews to purchase this model. So far  am still learning but not disappointed.

Reviews.Title: 100% satisfied thank you
Reviews.Author: Nestor Sanchez
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints of its services, as with the entire process of purchase, it was better if the camera to bring the memory card

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Mitchell
Reviews.Content: purchase process was excellent. More camera then I expected for the money. so far pics I have taken have been excellent.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Younis AL Sabree
Reviews.Content: It looks ok, but I don't like the resolution of picture, it's good for beginner photographer with low price .

Reviews.Title: it's ME
Reviews.Author: faye
Reviews.Content: i'm truly enjoying my camera  it's very nice take real good pictures i just love it my sister also brought one.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael Madsen "The Relic"
Reviews.Content: ...but you get what you pay for.  It has a lot of great features, and I have enjoyed using it, however I've noticed that the clarity of picture isn't the best on wide shots. The close up shots and macro shots look good and have relatively high quality, but wide shots and far away shots end up being grainy. That was a little disappointing.The camera is a decent one for the price you pay however.

Reviews.Title: amazing...
Reviews.Author: shannon tate
Reviews.Content: I'm having so much fun with this camera!! Every time i use it, i figure out something new about it.

Reviews.Title: Great middle-of-the-road camera.
Reviews.Author: luket
Reviews.Content: I originally purchased the Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera for our China trip but found it too bulky and complicated for point-and-shoot around town. I still like the Nikon and I'm keeping it for serious photography, but wanted something cheap and simple with a good zoom. This camera meets all my requirements.Somewhere in the reviews someone was complaining about the flash saying it doesn't work at all. I had no problem with the flash.The flash is manual meaning you need to press a button for it to pop up. I bet this is what tripped up the other user.All in all I like it a lot.I did however find the use of regular batteries sort of different (as opposed to rechargeable,) but I guess this is how they keep the price so low.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: anessa alfred
Reviews.Content: I always loved fuji camera I still have one of the non digital they are very good camera  and I would highly recommend fuji

Reviews.Title: Instuctions
Reviews.Author: MaryAnn P. Teal
Reviews.Content: I love the camera but all the instructions in the box were all in spanish.  I don't know if it was an error in the packing.  That was the only disappointing isssue. There was know bookets in english.

Reviews.Title: OMG!
Reviews.Author: Megan Brewer
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera i have ever owned. You have the issues sometimes you do with a regular digital camera (blurry pics) But all in all, The pictures turn out 99% of the time. I LOVE IT! Recommend this!

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Rose Pratt
Reviews.Content: My Fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital Camera is just what I wanted, it is high tech yet very easy to use for someone who is not too technically oriented.  I was traveling and had it shipped ahead and it arrived in time for me to use several days on my trip. The photos are really nice and I was able to share them with my associates. I really love my camera!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Catherine A Quinn
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for the same model  I like them, they are easy to use but give nice clear photos and have some options for more than point and shoot

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: Marvin D. Bowen
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 12 year old daughter. For the price it is an outstanding camera in every way.

Reviews.Title: Ove my new camera
Reviews.Author: Claudia Trincado "Claudytm"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, I think is worth more what I actually paid. Even though is used it looks like new. I will recommended this product 100%

Reviews.Title: Fuji Camera
Reviews.Author: George S
Reviews.Content: I own several Fuji cameras and have had tremendous luck with them.  Excellent pictures and powerful zoom.  Each member of my family has one.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: katyjones
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what we thought that it would be! Great little camera. Has lots of setting and very clear pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Mark Behrens
Reviews.Content: The camera takes excellent photos.  I am by no means a professional but the clarity and zoom are unbeatable for the price.  All the great reviews are very true.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Calvin Halcomb
Reviews.Content: Compact and very comfortable to use.  Easy to understand and simple to operate.  Quick flash recovery. Downside - requires memory card to operate - can't take pictures without one.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Paul Clancy
Reviews.Content: professsional fast service. I know very little about taking pictures, but I am very satisfied with this camera, clean,clear pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: DPMS Jack
Reviews.Content: Cant beat this camera. Takes very good pictures and is super easy to use. Just put it on auto and click away. Makes you look like a pro. Zoom quality is very clear. Adorama is a outstanding vendor. They have great prices and ship super fast. Would recomend to buy from them highly.

Reviews.Title: This camera is so simple
Reviews.Author: Raymond
Reviews.Content: This camera did everything I expected. Light weight and very simple to operate. With blink detector, can get the perfect picture without having to wait for prints. Easy and simple excellent camera.

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: Anngie "Angie"
Reviews.Content: this camera is the best, I had, I order it base on what a friend recomended, well whe it arrived I gave it to my friend to do the settings and he told me I had bought one of the best cameras and that it had many fiture other did not have, and the reach for taking picture from far away is the best, I used it several times, I even used it to take family Pictures and they were very very good clear pictures. I recomend this camera at any time

Reviews.Title: Very Good Camera!! :-)
Reviews.Author: Music2154
Reviews.Content: Let me first say that I rarely write product reviews but since this camera is great ill make an exception.This camera is great at taking pictures.  14 megapixels, auto focus, built in pop up flash, SD card readable, need i say more?! I really like the feature that allows you to choose between LCD screen or the EVF (Electronic View Finder).  The camera came with 4 alkaline batteries but i would strongly recommend buying some rechargeable batteries and charger for it (I use Duracell).  I bought rechargeable batteries before the camera came in the mail.  Trust me rechargeables come in handy in the long run rather than finding the nearest store to purchase some batteries.  Overall this is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Yes  I am so glade with my new camera ......thank's.
Reviews.Author: corantin.millogo
Reviews.Content: Yes I would recommend  you this camera.........give you a nice picture and easy  to use ......I  like the shutter  so smooth .......and perfect  for my Sunday  church use . I am so glad I have this fujifilm  finepix to work with.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised!! Fujifilm Fine Pix S4200
Reviews.Author: MGG
Reviews.Content: I was so happy when I opened the package, the camera came in the original Fujifilm box, brand new. It was in the plastic wrapping that was tapped with Fujifilm brand tape and everything. It included four AA batteries, a pretty long strap, cables to connect to tv/computer, and a protective cap to put on the lens. The camera is the perfect size and fits comfortably in my hand. I would definitely recommend! It does need a memory card so be sure to order or buy one before or it will NOT store your photos.

Reviews.Title: awsum camera
Reviews.Author: dave
Reviews.Content: we have taken a lot of pictures with it, and they come out real good. tried as many of the settings that I would use as I could, as I am not a photographer..  the flash seems to work fine and have not had any problems at all. the software seems to work well also.

Reviews.Title: Good bridge camera for my needs.
Reviews.Author: E. Litvin "Wladis"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a budgetary bridge camera.  Nothing special just family-album pictures 4" x 6" of people, tours to cities and museums, computer-screen, etc.  Research brings my attention to this camera.  Reading reviews I was concerned, that for some people the camera-flash is not working properly.  I did more extensive research and decided to order this camera not from "Amazon" but from "Adorama".  The price was the same just in hope for better quality.  So far I'm pretty happy with simplicity of purchase, delivery and camera's quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Patti
Reviews.Content: The camera was everything I wanted from the size to the quality of pictures.  Get one and tell me what you think

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: John Curry
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. I have enjoyed using it and have got some great shots. The 24X Optical Zoom performs greatHaven't used all the special features yet and am looking forward to trying them out. Overall I rate it Great.

Reviews.Title: wow!!!
Reviews.Author: J. A. "Lukashope"
Reviews.Content: here is one of the best items outstanding performance for the price, it has so many features it takes a while for you to get to know then all, the pictures are very clear you can take very sharp pictures close up and far away. I recommned this camera for anyone for the price you can't ask for more. The 26x Optical zoom its great, if you want to see this camera in action go to You Tube, search, Fujifilm S4200 Digital Camera... you'll be amazed..

Reviews.Title: Seems to be a nice camera
Reviews.Author: Kerin Dunham
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived ahead of the expected delivery date in good shape. It appears to be a nice camera and the first few pics we took seem very good for novices. Included in the box were three Beginner's owner manuals, in languages of FR, DE, and NL. One would think that an Owner's manual written in English might have been appropriate since the camera was shipped to an address in the United States. I know we can access a full manual on the internet but it would have been nice to have the condensed version to keep in the camera bag.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Little Camera
Reviews.Author: LisaCatFish
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and takes fantastic photos. I'm a terrible photographer and this camera does most of the work if you want. Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Stella Rolf
Reviews.Content: The last camera I owned was a 135mm. This is my first digital camera! It is totally awesome! The pictures are so clear and I love the zoom!

Reviews.Title: A camera for a good price!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Hannahban65
Reviews.Content: This camera i did not purchase of amazon, because i wanted to get the feel of the camera but i did purchase it at my local K-Mart. and i love it! it has easy software to use, and a great zoom. Most cameras when the zoom in they get all fuzzy... NOT THIS ONE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! LOVE IT SO MUCH. People say that the effects are bad because it only comes with normal and black and white. but i don't use effects so its perfect. Overall, i would purchase this camrea

Reviews.Title: An incredible camera at a bargain price
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: We received this camera 2 days sooner than promised.  The first night, I took a picture, using the flash, in total darkness.  The picture came out as if it was taken in daylight.  The camera is absolutely FANTASTIC.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Chad
Reviews.Content: I'm a novice photographer that was looking for a camera to take great pics of my sons sports activities. I wanted good pics, good zoom. This camera has it all, set the camera to automatic and let it worry about exposure, lighting and shutter speed. I dont want to hassle with all that. This camera is great!

Reviews.Title: works great for craigs list advertizing
Reviews.Author: Perry J. Lombardo
Reviews.Content: very HD looking- point and shoot ease of operation. The zoom lens is powerful, but I find myself using the widest angle all the time.

Reviews.Title: A good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Kevin Jones
Reviews.Content: The Fujifilm S4200 is a little bulky for it's capabilities and the in focus indicator is lacking but all in all it takes great pictures and the zoom is easy to operate.  Because of it's s;ow focus time I had to learn to anticipate my shots better in order to allow the camera time to focus and I still get an occasional blurred shot.

Reviews.Title: my camera
Reviews.Author: Wanda B.
Reviews.Content: it is a good camera just does not do very good taking pictures far away like it said it would be other then that it takes good pictures

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Mario Perri
Reviews.Content: Great camera for a teenager.  He produces great pictures especially with closeup shots(flowers). The telephoto and pixel qualitywas good. I recommend the camera for ease of use, point an shoot, and action shoots.Great learning and start up camera .

Reviews.Title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAID FOR
Reviews.Author: Your Friendly Stoner
Reviews.Content: Obviously, this isn't a professional camera. It's a simple one that is good for roaming cities and snapping memories. But, I don't recommend it if you are looking for extremely high quality. But, it does take decent pictures and has tremendous zoom. Certain features allow the camera to focus on text or smiles which is pretty good considering how little you're paying.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Donna Gerron
Reviews.Content: Camera for the amatur photographer. It does what it says it will. Takes great pictures. I wish it came with one of those rechargable batteries, but I guess I'll just have to invest in some rechargable AA batteries.

Reviews.Title: fantastic!!
Reviews.Author: Ashleigh
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a nice beginners camera for photography and personal photos. this has many different settings and is a great camera all around, zoom is clear, pics are vivid, i'd recommend it to anyone looking for a good, easy to use, and great priced camera!

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Dillander
Reviews.Content: I use it just for daily family pictures and it is a wonderful camera for the price! very satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: Stanley E. Rybolt
Reviews.Content: I guess this is what I paid for but I really don't think the pics are as crisp as they could be. I have played with the settings and they all come out about the same. I should have sent it back but it was $149.00, what can I say I should have popped for a Nikon.

Reviews.Title: I can not really reviw this product
Reviews.Author: B. Smith
Reviews.Content: Why i say i can nor review this product for is that i did not get it. Its not the shippers fault at all. Its who ever did this delivery. The day i was supposed to get i been home all day. I have nothing wrong from the person i order this from. I know if i had the money right now i would order this same camera or anorhwe one better then this one one with a remote but thank you for your time and effort.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Johnny Kistler
Reviews.Content: Cant beat this camera for the price can't be happier! Highly recomended takes awesome photo's from great distance with very little blur.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Michelle Magera
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera to my boyfriend for his birthday. He loved it. He takes it on all the road trips now.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: DEBRA FISHER
Reviews.Content: I like the Fujifillm FinePix S4200 camersa so far.  I've been able to take a few pictures.  Will have to wait till summer to get to really use it.If looking for a camera with zoom this is good.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the prize!
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: The camera is well built and feels solid. Its takes great images even at full zoom. Surprised with all the features

Reviews.Title: very good!
Reviews.Author: isaytomatoyousaytomahto
Reviews.Content: If you want a professional grade camera with changeable lenses, this isnt for you.  If you like taking photographs, were looking for something above the camera on your smartphone, and have fun testing out automatic and manual settings for the best shots, this is great.Low light photographs need you to be very still or use a tripod BUT this will turn out great images during the day, at night and indoors. If point and ahoot perfection is what you want, this isnt it except for daytime photos. Manual settings do much better for results you will be proud of.I would buy it again having used it and played with settings.  I use it several times a week for a month now.

Reviews.Title: wife loves the camera
Reviews.Author: tracy
Reviews.Content: she takes pictures of everything now , we have areas of the backyard i never knew existed before . very satisfied .

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift to me
Reviews.Author: Jennifer D. Farah
Reviews.Content: I had ben looking for a camera like this and fit my budget. Does everything I wanted it to do and is easy to learn to use,

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: crystal
Reviews.Content: I just received it recently so I haven't got to take too many pictures.  From what I have so far, I love it.  Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: semi-professional & Cheap
Reviews.Author: Osama
Reviews.Content: semi-professional & Cheap camera ... i bought it to my personal newspaper .. the price cheap then any digital camera in the same details

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: Kevin L. Majewski
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price.  Feels good in your hand when taking pictures...  I would buy this point & shoot camera again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome.
Reviews.Author: dcwow
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Great price. For anyone wanting a really good camera at a really good price, I recommend this camera. It's a little heavy, but not for it's size. I like a heavier camera. It has a neck-strap which is so much better than cameras with the wrist strap (in all fairness, though, the wrist-strap on this camera would not be ideal due to the sheer size and weight of this camera). This camera is perfect for my family.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mark Laflamme
Reviews.Content: Only 4 stars because of a dead pixel on arrival, other than that the camera is very nice and Hdmi output is a plus.

Reviews.Title: You will enjoy this Prosumer.
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: I choose this rating because it is a good product.  I would recomend it to anyone that enjoyes photography r just enjoys taking photos.  It is easy to learn and fun to use.  Very nice

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: C. E. Gors "cg"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY CAMERA..... price was right... and it came in a orderly fashion (day early actually)It works wonderfully... love everything about it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Susan Kelly
Reviews.Content: This camera is #16 in Amazon's top 100 Point and shoot cameras....it should be in the top 5. Great pictures, Super versatility and very easy to use. Fuji should print a more detailed user manual. Great camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: YAY! Class, style, and function!
Reviews.Author: B. Freeman
Reviews.Content: I just got it today, and have had a wonderful time taking pictures in all kinds of light settings, zooming in and out with the additional features, and the installation of the CD for fun stuff to do with the photos is a great bonus! The cable included gives me instant upload ability on the go, and I think this is a great camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality for Price
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: This would be my first Digital Camera that i have ever purchased. The picture quality and functionality of this device is excellent. Easy to use. I would recommend this device to anyone either starting out with Digital Photography or still consider themselves "Amateur ".

Reviews.Title: Gopod camera
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Just took this to Tahiti and it performed very, very well. I haven't developed the pictures yet but they all looked good on the viewer. The camera is quick to come so the automatic shut off is no problem. Got about 240 shots with one set of batteries. Bought rechargables  so I could recharge each evening and they would last all day.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: Tonya Pinson
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my purchase of this camera!  It takes beautiful pictures!  I like the fact that it has multiple options for taking pictures, and yet it's not complicated to operate.  So happy I bought it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product.
Reviews.Author: alanj
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera for the price paid.  Takes good pictures in all ways that I use it.  I am not a photographer, so I only use the automatic setting and let the camera do the rest.

Reviews.Title: Great Fujifilm Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Aginger
Reviews.Content: I've only had the camera for a week but I've been taking pictures everyday since I received it. I must say that it really is a great camera of course I have more to learn on using all the features but so far so good. The flash works just fine and goes off everytime I need it. The pictures I've taken come out crisp and clear. Just amazing results from this camera. I was really dissappointed with the shipping through USPS though. I ordered this camera on Dec,19th and it shipped out the very next day from the seller Priority Shipping. I did not receive my camera until Jan.15th due to post office error which is no fault of the seller. The transaction was really smooth with no problems and the price for the camera was awesome. And even though it took me a month to receive it I am so pleased with my purchase. I will update this review once I've had more time to use the camera if there is anything I need to add but as I said before so far so good.Update: May 6, 2013 and I am still pleased with my camera. No problems with it what so ever. I've been to Belgium, Prague, Paris and every picture I have taken has been wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Pat Williams
Reviews.Content: I like this a lot. Nice camera. Easy to use. Pictures are great. i love the zoom. The only thing I don't like is having to turn the camera off and back on when I forget to remove the lens cap.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: shayne q smart
Reviews.Content: I am still new to cameras and all functions that they can do but this camera has operated great and I read the extra online manual. Still learning but I like the picutre quality.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kendall R Smith
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it. Great photos and easy to opperate. Great optics and it has a good zoom lens for those long range shots.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!!
Reviews.Author: isaiah
Reviews.Content: Just got this camera for Christmas and still learning how to use it. The zoom is good, takes clear pictures, and takes pretty good videos too!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this camera.  It takes sharp hi-res photos for a pro-sumer camera.  It has many high end features that don't overwhelm the normal user.  Careful of battery level though...

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Bubba
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the price and very easy to use.  Recommend it if you want a range magnification for you pictures at a good price.

Reviews.Title: FinePix s4200
Reviews.Author: VOVA "just a fan"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 15 y. o. daughter. She is usually very difficult to please, not this time. She told me that she loves this camera. And she has a photography class in her school where she is friquently using this camera. This Fulifilm camera received exellent reviews from her teacher and other students.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: It takes no brain great pix and is easy to download.  I just can't stop taking pictures!  I keep it in my car so I will have it wherever I go.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: Marjon Selby "oliebol"
Reviews.Content: This camera is absolutely fantastic. Not only the price, which is fantastic as well but all the features that are build in to this compact, lightweight camera is just amazing. Even doing a close-up is really clear and sharp. I can highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: great shipping wonderful price very grateful
Reviews.Author: farah from egypt
Reviews.Content: i haven't used the camera much so far but this is my first bridge camera and so far i'm astonished by it' capabilities and  qualifications.....i already have a casio point and shoot camera which is about  only 3o dollars cheaper.....but so far behind in specifications.........part from the size i've always had problems with my hands' stability and definitely solved that.....lastly i just love it's moon pictures!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: More than expectd
Reviews.Author: Mitch
Reviews.Content: order the camera after quite a bit of on-line research. i got it really quick being that i was deployed over seas. The camera is easy to use and very user friendly. Love the design and feel. Its equipped with many shooting features and was easy to manipulate with little assistance from manual, but definitely recommended using the manual to get acquainted with all the features of this camera. all in all you can't be it for the price under $200 its is more that fills the interest of an up and coming photographer.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: lodgeboy
Reviews.Content: Bought this product based upon the good reviews. Overlooked the reviews that said the picture quality was not good. Big mistake. The pictures are not clear, and it is impossible to take a clear picture with the zoom lens.Sometimes a low price is the only good thing about an item.Returning the camera and upgrading to a Nikon.

Reviews.Title: A COSTLY MISTAKE
Reviews.Author: dee
Reviews.Content: Was not the camera I ordered. I ordered a Fujifilm S4200 and rceivef a Fujifilm S460and I ended up having to pay $100 more than what I originally seen advertised on Amazon. The product that I was sent looks to be made cheaper? Maybe I should stop buying from Amazon???

Reviews.Title: Cheap plastic camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a year ago. I used it twice when I first got it taking maybe 20 pictures and then put it back in the box. I had to download and print off the instructions of how to use it because it didn't come with instructions and it was so overwhelming I boxed up the camera and forgot about it. I just took it out and started to read the instructions to start using it and it won't work. In the user manual it said to contact a Fuji film dealer. Everyone that I have found online will not answer the phone. I took the camera to Staples to have one of their techs look at it and he told me there was something wrong in the lens mechanism. Do not buy this camera. There's no warrantee and Amazon will only except it back within 30 days of purchase. Plus it drains batteries without even being turned on. EEERRRRR.. I hate getting ripped off!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful low MP camera
Reviews.Author: GX107785 "groovybadger"
Reviews.Content: This is an underrated camera. When I sold my Nikon D5100, I could not live a day without a camera so I took my dad's little Fuji S4200. Little did I expect, this camera created beautiful pictures right off the bat and has a distinct "Fuji color" that I later found out after investigating further. Later on I bought a Fuji x100s and although I'm happy with it, I did not have that same "look" that this camera has.Cons:Quirtky menuSlow shutterPros:Just beautiful Jpegs.Amazing zoom.

Reviews.Title: first daughters wedding
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I was in a rush for this camera because my daughter was getting married in a few days. My other camera had finially died, not bad ten years old. this camera is easy to learn and take good pictures.

Reviews.Title: NO FLASH ON THIS PIECE OF TRASH
Reviews.Author: N. L. Coco "nxcoco"
Reviews.Content: The flash never worked on this camera.  Research the web and you'll find its a common problem.  I didn't discover the problem until after a month so i'm screwed.  I give it one star for this reason.  Avoid it.  In my opinion Fuji is going down hill on quality.

Reviews.Title: Best cam for the money
Reviews.Author: Ron K. Johnson
Reviews.Content: More than I was expecting. Close to a DSLR. Don't know if I'll ever use all the options. Very good price too.

Reviews.Title: I am still practicing to try and make perfect pics!
Reviews.Author: Carol Carr
Reviews.Content: Good price and love the telephoto and wide lens, but keeping photos and videos focused is tough! You MUST push the button halfway down to focus before snapping a photo. If it is important, I take the photo twice to make sure!

Reviews.Title: Ignored my return request
Reviews.Author: sheryl
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera hoping that the quality was as advertised however the quality is not very good in fact if you zoom too far out you can see the pixels. I contacted the seller to return the item even contacted Amazon in order to get this item returned. Amazon contacted them and sent me a copy of the three emails they sent to them.  To this day I have not heard from them and I am stuck with this camera that is not worth the money. My advice do not order from any company not willing to return an item.P.S. I  tried to return it the same day I received it and that still was not  enough for them to return the camera.

Reviews.Title: Pictures not as sharp as they should be, and it does NOT have any real manual control mode
Reviews.Author: R. L. Tompkins
Reviews.Content: I was surprised that the pictures taken with this camera were not sharper (actually somewhat less sharp than those taken with my little Canon Powershot).  And contrary to what is advertised, there is NO real manual control of shutter speed and aperture settings. If one sets the camera on manual mode, you will generally get no more than 2 choices of aperture setting for any given shutter speed.  I returned the camera for a refund and will have to invest a whole lot more money to get what I am looking for.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Christina Walker
Reviews.Content: Speaking for a camera novice. This is a very nice camera. Have had for a few days and have taken several pictures. Out of approximately 100 pics 2 have come out blurry. Taken lots of movement pics ( Running and jump roping) and have come out perfect.This camera does not take good low light pic's or I have not figured this out yet. But all mine have come out dark. All in all this is a very nice camera and I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy for the money!!
Reviews.Author: Angela M
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Fuji S7000 in 2005 and have used that camera since (excellent camera), so I had no hesitation checking out this camera for the money...right?! Well, let me tell you something! I use a tripod and shoot images of the moon that could be on the cover of Nat Geo!  The clarity is amazing!  The zoom is literally out of this world! I shot a video of a star blazing brightly and you could see the trail of gas fumes, it is so amazing I put it on youtube!And the macro..whoa!If you've never used a Fuji before, trust me, this camera will blow you out of the water for the money!Clearly I cannot say enough good things about this camera, but it is shocking to me that for a $150, I'm shooting images that look like I'm using a camera worth thousands!Just buy the camera!  You won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Elvis
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, easy to use. Takes great pictures! Nice size! Comes with cords and directions. Easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: fats "Bugmon"
Reviews.Content: Camera works just fine. It takes great pictures and is easy to understand all of its many functions. It will not however clean your room and take out the trash.Would have been nice if a case was included. Mine came with a lens cap ; neck strap; 4 batteries; instruction booklet- and it was packaged well.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix S4200
Reviews.Author: CHRISTY EBERLEIN
Reviews.Content: Omg, This is an amazing Camera for any price but especially the price I paid for it.  Awesome Job!  I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! The panorama feature is awesome, I love using it. The flash works great, I use it for most of my photos. The camera took a while to get to the door, but it was worth the wait. It isn't great at focusing and usually has grainy pictures without a flash.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Tracey Birch
Reviews.Content: Love it! Having a tough time with the focusing hang zooming. Ridiculous price! Very happy.So far my piece are beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Good but falls short in some ways
Reviews.Author: James Ownby
Reviews.Content: This camera takes amazing pictures. It has an amazing zoom that will knock your socks off. But there's also some not so amazing things about it. For one, it requires you to fully power up the camera, including removing the lens cap, when you hook it up to your computer to transfer files. So instead of an actual USB mode, which EVERY camera I've previously owned has had, this one requires you to fully power it up, remove the lens cap, potentially get it dirty while the display runs at full bright white. Annoying as heck and ultimately is potentially damaging. The other thing is the macro mode. Do NOT buy this camera if taking close-ups is a major thing for you. It just really sucks at that. The auto-focus is so completely non-functional in macro mode that the mode might as well not exist.NOW, having said all that, if you want a camera with a really good zoom that takes good pictures of people and the countryside, this does that very well. Just be prepared to use up a lot of your battery transferring files, and don't ask it to take close-ups.

Reviews.Title: Don't bother
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: I ended up sending this back the same day I got it. I tested the camera out for a few hours under conditions similar to what I inteded to use it for; which was low lighting from a distance. I had done research and this had specs  and reviews that sounded perfect for me. Unfortunately after getting the camera and becoming increasingly frustrated at the grainy or blurred quality of it's automatic settings, I turned to the internet and tried manually setting it based on what was recommended by other users. Still I had no luck, In a final test I set the camera on the floor, laid down, and tried to take a distance shot. It came out the same blurred, grainy, picture as what I'd been getting all afternoon. Back to Amazon it went.

Reviews.Title: Serious photographer on a budget --- Dissappointed
Reviews.Author: Richard Sonnenfeld
Reviews.Content: I am not a professional photographer, but I understand photography, and I regularly trade off shutter-speed, F-stop and CCD "speed" to get the shot I want.  Think of this camera as a point-and-shoot with better optics. It does have optical zoom, which is a good thing, but the CCD is clearly pretty small (not sure how small, but surely nothing close to a 35 mm frame).  Of course, the cameras that DO have large CCDs are $1000 or more.  So my disappointment is that this LOOKS like a real camera, but it isn't.Anyone who has studied the Megapixel wars knows that it's an invalid spec.  This camera may have 14 Mpixels, but I'd say the image quality is worse than the last Canon camera I had (which sadly broke) that had only 6 Mpixels.  It's really overall a bad thing.  A camera with 14 MPixels takes giant images (file size is giant) but the quality is not there.  So essentially you are wasting hard-drive space or clogging up your e-mail with files that are probably 5 times larger than they should be becauseof the empty magnification.  This camera is loadedwith features to try to get the best shot if you don't know anything about photography, but if you DO know something,it's frustrating.  I tried to use aperture priority mode, which should allow you to set the aperture and have the camerachoose the shutter speed to get the shot.  This is useful when you want to control depth of field.  On this camera, aperturepriority only allows F3.5 (wide open) and F8.  I was disappointed that you could not have anything in between.  I think it'sbecause it's really not for serious photographers.  So ... if you are one ... save your money till you can getsomething that you will like.

Reviews.Title: D'oh!
Reviews.Author: oliver
Reviews.Content: You sent the wrong camera you knobends. How can numbers be so terribly confusing? Well done Imbeciles. I love my new wrong camera but its not what I wanted so die Amazon.

Reviews.Title: older finepix cameras are better
Reviews.Author: sslainey
Reviews.Content: the more a camera does, the less I like it.  this one....sort of make me feel sick when using the viewer (very digital/electronic).  My old finepix worked great for years and then one day just broke.  This one has been a pain in the butt since day 1, but I'm low-tech and like things kept simple.It's alright.  I wouldn't buy it again.note:  you can't use the old finepix cameras on newer computers so.....be warned.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: aaron
Reviews.Content: I'm not a professional photographer but I do know good equipment. This camera is not worth what I paid. The batteries are eaten up from the flash in less than 10 minutes worth and the picture quality is terrible. It feels cheaply mad. I've used mine maybe two or three times and now it just sits in the closet. Never would I buy this again.

Reviews.Title: Flash stopped working about 1 month later.
Reviews.Author: K. Sakai
Reviews.Content: This camera was AMAZING!! I loved it!! I model & cosplay so I needed a camera bad. This camera gave me professional quality shots, but something started to go wrong a month later. Since I have to "pose" myself, I always have the 10 sec timer on.I noticed that the flash wasn't going off on "auto". I knew it was kind of weird because the light has always been dim in the room I shoot in & the pictures were coming off dark. So then I chose to force flash. BINGO. Nothing worked. 10 seconds, 2 seconds, the capture button, nothing. Nothing worked on force flash. I've tried restarting the camera - wiping everything clean. I looked up guilds & fixtures on what to do & I found out that the flash breaking on this camera is the #1 problem. Sadly I had to return this dream camera & I guess like someone mentioned, Fujifilm is going down. I'm going to get a Canon instead. I was really in love with this camera, but I guess it was too good to be true. ):

Reviews.Title: More like cameras of old with a view finder
Reviews.Author: Holly Taylor
Reviews.Content: I bought this because it has a viewfinder and I can steady the camera against my eyebrow.  I also love the flash feature, as you decide when to use it, not the camera.

Reviews.Title: Have had many great Fujifilm cameras and this is NOT one of them
Reviews.Author: Ursula Black
Reviews.Content: This is the fourth in a series of Fujifilm FinePix cameras, I have really enjoyed the others. They were solid, well balanced, flat like film cameras, and sturdy: they worked until someone dropped them or lost them. This one is, unfortunately, not like that.Out of the box, it feels very light and cheap in my hands. Some metal replaced by plastic. Did not have it very long before the buttons got difficult to use, and then impossible.It was under warranty so I sent it back. They returned the camera and told me there was nothing wrong with it.Especially in low light, it hurts my fingers to press them, I have to press so hard, and sometimes it won't take a picture at all. So frustrating to use.Now the navigation buttons don't work in two directions so it's very hard to go inside the menus and set the date, and there are some things you just can't do.It takes good pictures, if you can get it to take any pictures.Would have gladly paid $100 more for a quality camera like the other Fujifilm cameras were.

Reviews.Title: Do not waste the money
Reviews.Author: Grace Petrarca
Reviews.Content: This camera is terrible!  Pictures are blurry, and action shots are impossible.  I only wish I could return it...however the return policy does not allow....bummer

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Darlene Faulkner
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera, easy to learn......the only thing I DON'T like about it is the photo card is in the same spot as the batteries.  I have dumped the batteries twice because of that.

Reviews.Title: FinePix  S4200
Reviews.Author: Vicki Ray
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, lots of picture taking options. To bad the owners manual tells you nothing about the features or how the camera operates. If you have been schooled in photography or you don't mind searching the internet for tips, it a good camera. Otherwise just put it in manual and live with it. Oh, the price is reasonable.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Royce A.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take on a cross country trip, and was amazed at the pictures i was able to take with it.  It is absolutely unbelievable that a camera without a huge price tag can take such beautiful pictures. Would reccomend this camera to anyone.  It is also very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Amy E
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera about 6 months ago. The zoom is awful. Very grainy. You can't take a picture with the zoom, far away. Meaning if your subject is far away The dial mode sticks. Sometimes the lens sticks also. Pictures in bright light don't come out correctly.Sunrises the pictures are yellow. Not to say I haven't taken some nice pictures.But I do have a lot of lousy ones also. I have a point and shoot Canon takes better pictures. I will say the battery life is good. Very disappointed. Will never buy another Fuji.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Ron Lewis
Reviews.Content: If you don't want to spend a lot of money on a camera and still want  a good camera , this one has a great zoom lens and really takes good pictures. We purchased this camera right before our vacation this summer to the East Coast I took a lot of pictures and they all came out great .

Reviews.Title: Husband's B-day Present
Reviews.Author: E. Cullum "buyer"
Reviews.Content: My huusband is very happy with this camera .  He has a problem with his eyes and needs a view finder to see what he wants to shoot.  This camera fills the bill.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: JA
Reviews.Content: i filmed by boyfriend at his bodybuilding competition and the pics came out very nice, being that he was moving for his poses and the lighting is bright on the stage and i have no clue how to function a camera. but the instructions were pretty easy to follow and the pics that i took came out very nice.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations!
Reviews.Author: CAShumsker
Reviews.Content: This product far exceeded my expectations.  The zoom is amazing!  I gave this to my son for his birthday and created a shutter-bug.

Reviews.Title: Very sharp pictures
Reviews.Author: Richard S. Smith "rockon"
Reviews.Content: It takes great pictures, has too many features for the average person, does not zoom as far as I thought it would but all in all , it is well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Turner
Reviews.Content: It is alot more camera than I need or expected I could get. The camera takes very goog pics and the quality is fantastic. I do not know all of the controls yet but it is great.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!!
Reviews.Author: Randi Winans
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this camera.  This is the third one we have had, with the megapixels getting successively higher with each model.  One of the best things about this camera is the use of AA batteries to power it.  Always readily available no matter where we are.  The quality of the pictures and simplicity make it a favorite.  We have had many larger, more complicated cameras and this one remains the favorite.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Felecia Minor
Reviews.Content: This camera came right on time for me. I was thinking about going to Wal-Mart, but then I thought about the account I have with Amazon. I love the camera & price. This is going to work out just fine for my trip:).

Reviews.Title: Meets my high expectations
Reviews.Author: MeriC
Reviews.Content: I love my camera!  I previously owned a 2003 Fujifilm with similar features, which (as you may expect from it being 10years later in tech advancements) has been far exceeded by the new model.  The only complaint: it came with instructions in several language - none of which were English.  Luckily I am fluent in French! Plus, the camera is pretty intuitive to use, so I didn't need the instructions much to get going.  Also the camera was preprogrammed in Russian, so I had to stumble through the camera settings to figure out how to change the language to English (wasn't too hard: it had the standard symbols next to all the foreign words).  Bit tricky opening the battery/memory card compartment, but its very secure so you never have to worry about it accidentally opening! Overall a great deal for a great camera!

Reviews.Title: Nice For The Price
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: The camera does a really good job. the only thing that I wish they would have done was to make the lens interchangeable. the zoom is nice but it does take a little bit of time to zoom under low light conditions but again for the price it Is a very nice deal.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Lynnette Miller
Reviews.Content: Bought this to take graduation pictures and it was great.  Have to get used to a nice camera this time.  Only thing I didn't like was that there was no English manual.  You have to go onto the cd rom and print it out yourself, three other languages and not one of the manuals were English!

Reviews.Title: Terrific Product at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: wattley
Reviews.Content: I bought one as a gift for a friend and decided to buy one for myself at the same time.  We both love this camera due to the quality of the images and the various options available.  Though I have much to learn in regards to the various options, so far my favorite has been the panoramic photography set up.  I'm very satisfied with this camera.

Reviews.Title: I ordered for my daughter.
Reviews.Author: Marion Martin
Reviews.Content: She loved this camera and it also is a constant item with her. Her pictures are presented on Facebook and they are excellent and her friends really gave her an A plus for the clarity of her pictures.Marion Martin

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Jesse Finney
Reviews.Content: This one is pretty good but I would go for the upgrade if I were buying again. Nice pictures too.

Reviews.Title: Not 'Pro' quality, but for most situations great for my purposes.
Reviews.Author: Steven L. Green
Reviews.Content: This camera is a few steps above 'point and shoot' cameras and for the price, I think an excellent choice. I was disappointed to find neither of the manuals included were in English, but the online version tells me what I need. It has far too many pages to print though. I've printed only what I need at the time.

Reviews.Title: MISSING MANUAL
Reviews.Author: Thomas Hoffmann
Reviews.Content: I Like the camera however there was no instructional manual--- oh yes there were 3 in a foreign languages--go figure!

Reviews.Title: Love It !!!
Reviews.Author: Laura Storey "cruzinstorey"
Reviews.Content: Wasn't sure if I wanted to go back to a bigger camera, but I'm glad I did.  It is much easier to hold steady.  I've only had the camera for a week so I am still learning all the features.  I am very happy with it so far.  It is very easy to use and I am very satisfied with the picture quality.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: B. F.
Reviews.Content: camera is ok but the battery is a pain in the .... so be beware when and if you buy this product.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: shanna
Reviews.Content: its a great cam it didnt come with the peices to connect to the computer with...but it takes great pics.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Russell Ohara
Reviews.Content: This thing is great, it was shipped so quickly,i highly recommend this camera.  Very impressed, i would order again,no dobut.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with all the options of this camera. Takes good pictures in all different  settings. Price is a great bonus.

Reviews.Title: o.k.
Reviews.Author: Humberto Diaz A.
Reviews.Content: all o.k. great product. function normally and i like your goods. manufactures is o.k. i will buy in the future other products.

Reviews.Title: Its alright
Reviews.Author: sam
Reviews.Content: Its really hard to get the camera to focus at night. I use it to take pictures during parties and most of the time the pictures come out blurry. During the day takes nice pictures. Maybe its because I still do not know how to use it well. otherwise its alright i mean dont compare it with a Cannon. Oh one more thing i didnt like that you cant manually focus the camera compared to other but as i said its alright.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera but.....
Reviews.Author: Lubricator
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital CameraThe camera is fine.  However, the software that came with it sucks.  Also the basic manual is lacking in depth.  I recommend downloading the manual from the Fujifilm web site.  It is much easier to read on the computer.  It might be a good idea to print it.  Be advised there are 131 pages to the downloaded manual for this S4200 camera.  I gave it 4 stars because the movies could be better.

Reviews.Title: My Fujifilm Finepix S4200 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Manuel Mercedes "manuel6440"
Reviews.Content: This is my first Fujifilm camera, because all my past were sony. This camera is very easy to take photos.The only problem is the battery life is very short and the photo quality is no so good like the sony's cameras that I had.

Reviews.Title: Breaks easily & Fuji will not admit fault
Reviews.Author: fverter "fverter"
Reviews.Content: I paid $180 for this camera and gave it to my teenage daughter as a birthday gift in July 2012.  She used it a lot on a tripod to take videos of herself and friends dancing, which she uploaded to YouTube. She loved it. But then, within 3 months the lens stopped zooming in and out properly. Simultaneously, the view screen went black. I checked that the warranty was for one year, so I shipped it back. Fuji is claiming it is "impact damage" and wants $150 to "repair it", which is what the camera sells for now. I am not repairing it and our next camera will not be Fuji.

Reviews.Title: Flash failed to fire
Reviews.Author: Wickscraft
Reviews.Content: I used the camera for about 10 minutes and couldn't get the flash to fire at all. That seems to be a regular problem with the Fujifilm FinePix S4XXX series. Back to Amazon it goes. Otherwise, it seemed to be a great little camera, but I do need the flash to work.

Reviews.Title: quit working
Reviews.Author: Mike Kautz
Reviews.Content: The first time I plugged it in it quit working I have sent it back to Amazon for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Acceptable
Reviews.Author: Gene B
Reviews.Content: Large camera with many features that cannot be used by a novice photographer.  If you aren't familiar with photographic terminology ..... don't buy this camera.  Purchase one that is simpler to use.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: George Shaffer
Reviews.Content: For an amateur casual user, like me,  this is a really cool camera for the money..  Easy to use and the pics are fabulous.I have not installed the software yet to try it.  Mostly bundles software with cameras is pain in the but advertizing and trying to control your PC stuff.  But this is the first new camera I have purchased in about 3 years and I am very pleased ....

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: phlox
Reviews.Content: Great camera easy to operate. The only problem I had was in the on and off switch after 3 days of use it got stuck in the off position.  I have to manipulate the switch manually to get the camera to turn on.  unfortunately, I did not take the warranty on the camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!!!!
Reviews.Author: dewbabyt
Reviews.Content: Love this camera...read all the review prior to purchase and am very happy with the quality of pictures and video it takes.

Reviews.Title: But for the price...
Reviews.Author: hookworm
Reviews.Content: Yeah, it's not great in low light. If you want a good, consumer grade (or higher end) camera you may want to look into a Canon, any Canon but I've always been a fan of Fuji cameras like this. I had the 3100 before this. Their inexpensive, they zoom (reasonably) and they do work well if you learn how to use it. You can't go into this comparing it to a $500-$600 camera and you can't really compare it to a compact $100-150 camera that doesn't have the same functionality. I know this might not be a helpful review, but if you get this for a good price you may like it. If you've had better cameras before you probably wont like it. Of course it's not compact and, again, it does not work well in low light.

Reviews.Title: Muy buena opción por ese precio
Reviews.Author: Nestor
Reviews.Content: Es una muy buena cámara, elegida principalmente por la cantidad de características similares a las cámaras profesionales. Posee una muy buena optica y un zoom más que suficiente para tomas hechas por no profesionales. La calidad de las imagenes es buena.La recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: Can't wait to get it.
Reviews.Author: K. Walker "copswife"
Reviews.Content: I was sent the wrong camera but everything was taken care of very quickly. This is for my granddaughter and I'm so excited to get it.

Reviews.Title: Could do better
Reviews.Author: Onyekachi John Robert-Eze
Reviews.Content: Crappy camera, my iPhone takes better pictures. I ordered this camera for over 100 dollars and it sucks. I'm getting a Kodac.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: el
Reviews.Content: great camera love it takes beautiful pictures I suggest anybody that buys it, you'll love it and leave a rating for them because it it's a great camera

Reviews.Title: Memory card..Optional???
Reviews.Author: Sarada McClean
Reviews.Content: I have given three stars because I can't fathom why the memory card would be optional and not included.  It is larger than I expected.  It seems to take good pictures.  I'm a novice, however I was told by a camera person that it's a great camera.

Reviews.Title: if you want as disposible camera...
Reviews.Author: Doris McWhorter
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera les than a year.  I was happy with the quality pictures and zoom.  But, for it to quit in less than a year!  I cannot give it a good rating!

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE PRODUCTO ES MAS DE LO QUE ESPERABA
Reviews.Author: HENRY GUERRERO
Reviews.Content: UNA MUY BUENA Y POTENTE CAMARA. ME PARECE QUE ES MUY BUENA PARA LOS QUE INCURCIONAN EN LA FOTOGRAFIA... LA RECOMIENDO 100%

Reviews.Title: I expected better from Fujifilm.
Reviews.Author: S-mario
Reviews.Content: I used mine for a week and at the end I returned it.The only things I like was the price(of course), it has a well design case(good grip) and the zoom. Anything else is just not as good as I expected. I am not expert in taking pictures but things like fast focus, simple menu, light exposure are important for me.

Reviews.Title: Wilson Castaño
Reviews.Author: WILSON CASTAÑO
Reviews.Content: Porque estuvo todo excelente muchisimas gracias, la calidad, era lo que esperaba y lleno mis espectativas. simplemente excelente la voy a recomendar tambien

Reviews.Title: Todo bien!
Reviews.Author: J.Isiar Marcano
Reviews.Content: Entrega rapida, tal como lo promocionan y con todos los accesorios que indicaban. Fueron probados y aprobados. Excelente. Cumple con mis espectativas!

Reviews.Title: buenisima
Reviews.Author: jonathan marin herrera
Reviews.Content: muy bueno, totalmente recomendable. . . e x c e l e n t e  p r o d u c t o

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: sbrennan630
Reviews.Content: I've loved using this camera. The one thing I learned is that the flash mode is pretty important. So I ususally use the flash for every picture, even if I'm taking pictures outside. Other than that, it's great.  It takes great pictures, it's easy to use, and it's very economical.

Reviews.Title: she is back
Reviews.Author: Marcel
Reviews.Content: used to have one of this but after a couple of years it stop working properly and the warranty didn't the damage. now that i have it back, i can feel complete= SBK+CAMARA+ROAD!! awesome thx!!

Reviews.Title: Cant Focus! Always YELLOW with Sepia OFF!
Reviews.Author: Sarah Crumpler
